explanation: [0-0] Two men are standing at the bottom of a staircase inside a house. The man on the left is wearing a black T-shirt, and the man on the right is wearing a black sleeveless vest. They are both barefoot. Red and yellow balloons are lined up on the steps on both sides of the stairs.

[0-4] The subtitle "GO!" appears in the middle of the screen. They then run up the stairs together, popping the balloons on the stairs with their hands. They run to the corner of the stairs, then the man in the black T-shirt runs to the left and the man in the black sleeveless vest runs to the right, popping the balloons on the railing and the wall at the same time.

[4-12] They then arrive at the corridor at the top of the stairs and jump down. As they move, the surrounding scenery moves upward. They then land on two sponge mats downstairs, roll around, get up, and run to the red and gray square mat placed on the sponge mat. The man in the black sleeveless vest then takes the lead and pops a blue balloon hanging on the wall. Afterward, the man in the black sleeveless vest stands on the mat with his hands raised in delight, while the man in the black T-shirt lies on the mat, looking up.
